Text: These profits are generating higher share prices (fueled by share buybacks) and higher executive pay, resulting in wider inequality. The richest 1% of Americans own about 40% of all shares of stock the richest 10%, around 80%.
Cause: These profits are generating higher share prices (fueled by share buybacks) and higher executive pay, resulting in wider inequality.
Effect: The richest 1% of Americans own about 40% of all shares of stock the richest 10%, around 80%.
Sentence: <e1>These profits are generating higher share prices (fueled by share buybacks) and higher executive pay, resulting in wider inequality.</e1> <e2>The richest 1% of Americans own about 40% of all shares of stock the richest 10%, around 80%.</e2>
